NOVA Challenge

     

ABOUT THE EVENT

The mission of the NOVA Challenge is to bring together two neighboring counties in a friendly rivalry that showcases boys’ basketball talent in Northern Virginia and each year supports a new local charity. The top seniors from Fairfax and Loudoun County will compete against one another in a dunk contest, 3 point contest and all-star game.  Follow us on twitter for the latest updates. @NovaChallenge

Admission: $7

2015 EVENT SUMMARY

We would like to thank everyone who came to this year's Nova Challenge. Your support helped us raise over $1200 for the Loudoun Abused Women's Shelter.  In addition, we would like to thank everyone who made Sunday run smoothly: Evolution Basketball, Cardinal Officials Association, Nova Cavaliers and Legit Sport Stats.  Also, our incredible sponsors Marlow Sports, BLT T-Shirt Printers and Virginia Ground Covers. Without their support, the Nova Challenge would not have been possible.  The 3rd Annual Nova Challenge will be held in March 2016 in Fairfax County.  Site TBA

2015 RESULTS

Fairfax 122   Loudoun 110

3 Point Champion- Jason Jolly (Stone Bridge HS)

Dunk Champion- Tyler Barton (Fairfax HS)

Loudoun MVP- Jason Jolly (Stone Bridge HS)

Fairfax MVP- Tyvez Monroe (Edison HS)
